resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

fields.description:
Kitchensink - YQL  - Unable to make local search using YQL

This is not regression since the issue occurs in 3.1.1 GA as well

Steps:
1. Go to KS> Mashups> YQL> local search
2. Observe the output.

Actual:
Just label 'Sushi near Appcelerator HQ' is displayed but no address detail is displayed under this.

Expected:
It should display requested address details as well.
fields.summary: Android: Kitchensink - YQL  - Unable to make local search using YQL
fields.environment:

Tested with:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201307311816

Devices:
Nexus7(2)
Nexus4
Android version 4.3
KitchenSink version 3.1.1.GA GUID:28a706e9-4130-4acb-bc76-9494255a9279

Cannot reproduce, refer to the screenshot exp.png

Anshu, this seems related to your location. If there is nothing we can do to resolve for you (perhaps try from home, etc...) , we will have to rely on our local testing to close. Please comment and I will either close or decide on the next step.

Tested with:
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.2.201308071912
Titanium SDK: 3.1.2.v20130807171139
ACS: 1.0.5
Alloy: 1.2.0-alpha6
NPM: 1.3.2
Titanium: 3.1.2-alpha
Titanium-code-processor: 1.0.2-alpha
Android SDk Tools: 22.0.4
Device - Nexus7 (Android v4.2.1)

Shows the same details as mentioned in the screen shot. Hence closing this issue.
